modName: Raccoons and Skunks Companions and Armies
summary: This mod adds Raccoons and Skunks : Summonable creatures with the books/spells,  Armies with the scrolls, and a Companion. DLC DRAGONBORN NEEDED.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds Raccoons and Skunks : Summonable creatures with the books/spells, Armies with the scrolls, and a Companion. DLC DRAGONBORN NEEDED.

[url=https://www.casimages.com/img.php?i=18080408112216616015834832.jpg][img]https://nsm09.casimages.com/img/2018/08/04//18080408112216616015834832.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000][b] [size=5]ARMIES/HORDES [/size][/b] [/color] (Agressive Skunks or Passive and Docile Raccoons)


This mod adds the ability to quickly create hordes of creatures (5, 15, 50, 100 ...MORE ?...ATTENTION with the freezes in your computer !)

To obtain these creatures, simply buy scrolls found with some Merchants in [color=#ff8c00] Riverwood [/color]: [i] Lucan Valerius, Orgnar in the Sleeping Giant Inn[/i], [i] Alvor[/i]. Now open up your inventory, navigate to "Scrolls" and there they are. You throw them and when they hit the ground they hatch into creatures …

In order to find the scrolls at Merchants, you must choose the mod for which you want to buy and place it at the bottom of the list when you launch the game.



[color=#ff0000][b][size=5]SUMMONABLE RACCOON or SKUNKS[/size][/b][/color]


To have the summonable creatures, you must buy the (2) “Spell tome: XXXX” at [b][color=#00ff00]Farengar[/color][/b][color=#00ff00] Secret-Fire[/color] in Dragonsreach/Fort Dragon (Whiterun) or with an other "Spell Vendor" (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace/Palais bleu in Solitude).

With the book, you have the (2) spells (Duration of the summon: 1 hour) ...

You can easily DISMISS when you want ! with an other "Spell tome: Dismiss Summoned Raccoon"

In order to buy the 3 books at Farengar, you must place this mod at the bottom of the list when you launch the game



[color=#ff0000][b] [size=5]COMPANION [/size][/b] [/color]


One Raccoon near the bridge of Riverwood

You can talk: Wait - Follow - Trade - Favor - Dismiss, with this pet

You can only have one follower at a time: if you want a different one, you need to dismiss the first one before you recruit them.

If you have any problem with the dialog box, or if telling the follower to return at home doesn't dismiss him, or if you have lost the active follower, you can try this:

Type “²” or "`" or "~" key to get into console, and type:

set playeranimalcount to 0

With Amazing Follower Tweaks , or other mod with followers, if problem to dismiss the followers, you can uncheck this mod (AFT or other) when you launch the game

If problem with the Dialog Box of the followers/ companions (Wait - Follow - Trade - Favor - Dismiss) you can also enter / exit a house or make a fast travel



[size=4][b][color=#ff0000]CREDITS[/color][/b][/size]

[color=#ff0000]Mihail Romanov[/color] for the Raccoon and the Skunks in his mod [url= https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/92865/] Racoons and Skunks- Elements of Skyrim pt.17 (mihail immersive add-ons- animals) [/url]
author: gg77
